headline: HII Marks Oklahoma (SSN 802) Construction Milestone at Newport News Shipbuilding
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., Dec. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) announced today that its Newport News Shipbuilding division has reached a significant construction milestone for Virginia-class submarine Oklahoma (SSN 802). Oklahoma is now “pressure hull complete,” which signifies all of the hull sections have joined to form a single, watertight unit. “Achieving pressure hull complete on Oklahoma highlights our commitment to accelerating production and delivering unmatched capability to our N

headline: BAE Systems Secures a Contract to Support USS Forrest Sherman
summary: BAESY lands a $117.7M Navy contract to modernize the USS Forrest Sherman, supporting maintenance and upgrades through fiscal 2026 work.

raw.headline: BAE Systems Secures a Contract to Support USS Forrest Sherman

headline: How Is Huntington Ingalls Industries Stock Performance Compared to Other Aerospace and Defense Stocks?
summary: Huntington Ingalls Industries’ Stock has outperformed the other aerospace and defense stocks over the past year, and analysts remain fairly bullish about its prospects.

raw.headline: How Is Huntington Ingalls Industries Stock Performance Compared to Other Aerospace and Defense Stocks?

headline: What Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII)'s ROMULUS Milestone and Submarine Deal Mean For Shareholders
summary: Earlier this month, Huntington Ingalls Industries reported that construction of its ROMULUS unmanned surface vessel prototype had reached 30% completion and remained on track for sea trials in late 2026, while also expanding its Virginia-class submarine workshare through a new outsourced assemblies contract with Babcock. These developments underscore how HII is pairing its traditional shipbuilding base with AI-enabled autonomy and international industrial partnerships to deepen its role in...
